verses.verse: לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons עַמּ֗וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲבָנִ֥ים <WH1121> the sons אֵין֙ <WH369> have לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Hath Israel אִם־ <WH518> lo יוֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH3423> inherit אֵ֣ין <WH369> no ל֑וֹ מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> how יָרַ֤שׁ <WH3423> possession מַלְכָּם֙ <WH4428> ? why [then] doth their king אֶת־ <WH853> גָּ֔ד <WH1410> Gad וְעַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> and his people בְּעָרָ֥יו <WH5892> Ai יָשָֽׁב׃ <WH3427> dwell

לָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֨ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֜ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וְ֠הִשְׁמַעְתִּי <WH8085> to be heard אֶל־ <WH413> Against רַבַּ֨ת <WH7237> in Rabbah בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon תְּרוּעַ֣ת <WH8643> that I will cause an alarm מִלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> of war וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> will become לְתֵ֣ל <WH8510> heap שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> and it shall be a desolate וּבְנֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> and her daughters בָּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> with fire תִּצַּ֑תְנָה <WH3341> shall be burned וְיָרַ֧שׁ <WH3423> be heir יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> then shall Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יֹרְשָׁ֖יו <WH3423> unto them that were his heirs אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הֵילִ֨ילִי <WH3213> Howl חֶשְׁבּ֜וֹן <WH2809> O Heshbon כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֻׁדְּדָה־ <WH7703> is spoiled עַ֗י <WH5857> for Ai צְעַקְנָה֮ <WH6817> cry בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> ye daughters רַבָּה֒ <WH7237> of Rabbah חֲגֹ֣רְנָה <WH2296> gird שַׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> you with sackcloth סְפֹ֕דְנָה <WH5594> lament וְהִתְשׁוֹטַ֖טְנָה <WH7751> and run to and fro בַּגְּדֵר֑וֹת <WH1448> by the hedges כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מַלְכָּם֙ <WH4428> for their king בַּגּוֹלָ֣ה <WH1473> into captivity יֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> will go כֹּהֲנָ֥יו <WH3548> [and] his priests וְשָׂרָ֖יו <WH8269> and his princes יַחְדָּֽיו׃ <WH3162> together

מַה־ <WH4100> How תִּתְהַֽלְלִי֙ <WH1984> Wherefore gloriest בָּֽעֲמָקִ֔ים <WH6010> thou in the valleys זָ֣ב <WH2100> thy flowing עִמְקֵ֔ךְ <WH6010> valley הַבַּ֖ת <WH1323> daughter הַשּֽׁוֹבֵבָ֑ה <WH7728> O backsliding הַבֹּֽטְחָה֙ <WH982> trusts בְּאֹ֣צְרֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH214> in her treasures מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יָב֥וֹא <WH935> [saying] Who shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> against

הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> I am going מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> Behold I will bring עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> and פַּ֗חַד <WH6343> a fear נְאֻם־ <WH5002> upon thee saith אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> from all those that be about וְנִדַּחְתֶּם֙ <WH5080> thee and ye shall be driven out אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> right forth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מְקַבֵּ֖ץ <WH6908> and none shall gather up לַנֹּדֵֽד׃ <WH5074> him that wandereth

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And afterward כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that אָשִׁ֛יב <WH7725> I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> the captivity בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

לֶאֱד֗וֹם <WH123> Concerning Edom כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַאֵ֥ין <WH369> is there ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> [Is] wisdom בְּתֵימָ֑ן <WH8487> south אָבְדָ֤ה <WH6> perished עֵצָה֙ <WH6098> advice מִבָּנִ֔ים <WH995> from the prudent נִסְרְחָ֖ה <WH5628> vanished חָכְמָתָֽם׃ <WH2451> ? is their wisdom

נֻ֤סוּ <WH5127> Flee הָפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> ye turn back הֶעְמִ֣יקוּ <WH6009> deep לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <WH3427> dwell יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> O inhabitants דְּדָ֑ן <WH1719> of Dedan כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥יד <WH343> the calamity עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> of Esau הֵבֵ֥אתִי <WH935> for I will bring עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> upon עֵ֥ת <WH6256> upon him the time פְּקַדְתִּֽיו׃ <WH6485> [that] I will visit

אִם־ <WH518> If בֹּֽצְרִים֙ <WH1219> If grapegatherers בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> come לָ֔ךְ לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַשְׁאִ֖רוּ <WH7604> to thee would they not leave עֽוֹלֵל֑וֹת <WH5955> grapes אִם־ <WH518> If גַּנָּבִ֥ים <WH1590> thieves בַּלַּ֖יְלָה <WH3915> by night הִשְׁחִ֥יתוּ <WH7843> they will destroy דַיָּֽם׃ <WH1767> till they have enough

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> but אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I חָשַׂ֣פְתִּי <WH2834> bare אֶת־ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> But I have made Esau גִּלֵּ֙יתִי֙ <WH1540> I have uncovered אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְתָּרָ֔יו <WH4565> his secret places וְנֶחְבָּ֖ה <WH2247> to hide לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יוּכָ֑ל <WH3201> and he shall not be able שֻׁדַּ֥ד <WH7703> is spoiled זַרְע֛וֹ <WH2233> himself his seed וְאֶחָ֥יו <WH251> and his brethren וּשְׁכֵנָ֖יו <WH7934> and his neighbours וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> is no

עָזְבָ֥ה <WH5800> Leave יְתֹמֶ֖יךָ <WH3490> thy fatherless children אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֲחַיֶּ֑ה <WH2421> I will preserve [them] alive וְאַלְמְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH490> and let thy widows עָלַ֥י <WH5921> and תִּבְטָֽחוּ׃ <WH982> trust ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אֵ֨ין <WH369> were not מִשְׁפָּטָ֜ם <WH4941> Behold they whose judgment לִשְׁתּ֤וֹת <WH8354> [was] not to drink הַכּוֹס֙ <WH3563> of the cup שָׁת֣וֹ <WH8354> have assuredly יִשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> drunken וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you ה֔וּא <WH1931> the one נָקֹ֖ה <WH5352> and [art] thou he [that] shall altogether תִּנָּקֶ֑ה <WH5352> go unpunished לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִנָּקֶ֔ה <WH5352> ? thou shalt not go unpunished כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שָׁתֹ֖ה <WH8354> but thou shalt surely תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> drink

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בִ֤י נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH7650> For I have sworn נְאֻם־ <WH5002> by myself saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְשַׁמָּ֧ה <WH8047> shall become a desolation לְחֶרְפָּ֛ה <WH2781> a reproach לְחֹ֥רֶב <WH2721> a waste וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> and a curse תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become בָצְרָ֑ה <WH1224> that Bozrah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֶ֥יהָ <WH5892> and all the cities תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <WH1961> will become לְחָרְב֥וֹת <WH2723> wastes עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> thereof shall be perpetual

שְׁמוּעָ֤ה <WH8052> a rumour שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> I have heard מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD וְצִ֖יר <WH6735> and an ambassador בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> unto the heathen שָׁל֑וּחַ <WH7971> is sent הִֽתְקַבְּצוּ֙ <WH6908> [saying] Gather ye together וּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and come עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> against וְק֖וּמוּ <WH6965> against her and rise up לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to the battle

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold קָטֹ֛ן <WH6996> thee small נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> For lo I will make בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the heathen בָּז֖וּי <WH959> [and] despised בָּאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> among men

תִּֽפְלַצְתְּךָ֞ <WH8606> Thy terribleness הִשִּׁ֤יא <WH5377> hath deceived אֹתָךְ֙ <WH853> זְד֣וֹן <WH2087> thee [and] the pride לִבֶּ֔ךָ <WH3820> of thine heart שֹֽׁכְנִי֙ <WH7931> O thou that dwellest בְּחַגְוֵ֣י <WH2288> in the clefts הַסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> of the rock תֹּפְשִׂ֖י <WH8610> that holdest מְר֣וֹם <WH4791> the height גִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1389> of the hill כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though תַגְבִּ֤יהַ <WH1361> as high כַּנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> as the eagle קִנֶּ֔ךָ <WH7064> though thou shouldest make thy nest מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there אֽוֹרִידְךָ֖ <WH3381> I will bring thee down נְאֻם־ <WH5002> from thence saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> will become אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> Also Edom לְשַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8047> shall be a desolation כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> every one that goeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and יִשֹּׁ֥ם <WH8074> by it shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <WH8319> and shall hiss עַל־ <WH5921> at כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַכּוֹתֶֽהָ׃ <WH4347> at all the plagues

כְּֽמַהְפֵּכַ֞ת <WH4114> As in the overthrow סְדֹ֧ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וּשְׁכֵנֶ֖יהָ <WH7934> and the neighbour אָמַ֣ר <WH559> [cities] thereof saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> shall abide שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> no man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָג֥וּר <WH1481> dwell בָּ֖הּ בֶּן־ <WH1121> there neither shall a son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man

הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold כְּאַרְיֵ֞ה <WH738> like a lion יַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> Behold he shall come up מִגְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> from the swelling הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <WH3383> of Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> against נְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> against the habitation אֵיתָן֒ <WH386> of the strong כִּֽי־ <WH3588> in אַרְגִּ֤יעָה <WH7280> but I will suddenly אֲרִיצֶ֨נּוּ <WH7323> make him run away מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וּמִ֥י <WH4310> and whoever בָח֖וּר <WH970> young אֵלֶ֣יהָ <WH413> over אֶפְקֹ֑ד <WH6485> [man that] I may appoint כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֤י <WH4310> who כָמ֙וֹנִי֙ <WH3644> is like וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יֹעִידֶ֔נִּי <WH3259> over her? for who [is] like me? and who will appoint me the time וּמִי־ <WH4310> and who זֶ֣ה <WH2088> then רֹעֶ֔ה <WH7462> ? and who [is] that shepherd אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> that will stand לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Therefore hear עֲצַת־ <WH6098> the counsel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יָעַץ֙ <WH3289> that he hath taken אֶל־ <WH413> against אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> against Edom וּמַ֨חְשְׁבוֹתָ֔יו <WH4284> and his purposes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָשַׁ֖ב <WH2803> that he hath purposed אֶל־ <WH413> against יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> against the inhabitants תֵימָ֑ן <WH8487> of Teman אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִסְחָבוּם֙ <WH5498> shall draw them out צְעִירֵ֣י <WH6810> Surely the least הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> of the flock אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַשִּׁ֛ים <WH8074> desolate עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> because נְוֵהֶֽם׃ <WH5116> surely he shall make their habitations

מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> at the noise נִפְלָ֔ם <WH5307> of their fall רָעֲשָׁ֖ה <WH7493> is moved הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> The earth צְעָקָ֕ה <WH6818> at the cry בְּיַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֖וּף <WH5488> in the Red נִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> thereof was heard קוֹלָֽהּ׃ <WH6963> the noise

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold כַנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> as the eagle יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> Behold he shall come up וְיִדְאֶ֔ה <WH1675> and fly וְיִפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> and spread כְּנָפָ֖יו <WH3671> his wings עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּצְרָ֑ה <WH1224> over Bozrah וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become לֵ֞ב <WH3820> shall the heart גִּבּוֹרֵ֤י <WH1368> of the mighty men אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> of Edom בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> and at that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he כְּלֵ֖ב <WH3820> be as the heart אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> of a woman מְצֵרָֽה׃ <WH6887> in her pangs ס

לְדַמֶּ֗שֶׂק <WH1834> Concerning Damascus בּ֤וֹשָֽׁה <WH954> is confounded חֲמָת֙ <WH2574> Hamath וְאַרְפָּ֔ד <WH774> and Arpad כִּי־ <WH3588> for שְׁמֻעָ֥ה <WH8052> tidings רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> for they have heard נָמֹ֑גוּ <WH4127> they are fainthearted בַּיָּ֣ם <WH3220> on the sea דְּאָגָ֔ה <WH1674> [there is] sorrow הַשְׁקֵ֖ט <WH8252> be quiet לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> it cannot

רָפְתָ֥ה <WH7503> is waxed feeble דַמֶּ֛שֶׂק <WH1834> Damascus הִפְנְתָ֥ה <WH6437> [and] turneth לָנ֖וּס <WH5127> herself to flee וְרֶ֣טֶט ׀ <WH7374> and fear הֶחֱזִ֑יקָה <WH2388> hath seized צָרָ֧ה <WH6869> on [her] anguish וַחֲבָלִ֛ים <WH2256> and sorrows אֲחָזַ֖תָּה <WH270> have taken כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> her as a woman in travail

אֵ֥יךְ <WH349> How לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not עֻזְּבָ֖ה <WH5800> not left עִ֣יר <WH5892> How is the city [תְּהִלָּה כ] (תְּהִלָּ֑ת <WH8416> deep ק) קִרְיַ֖ת <WH7151> the city מְשׂוֹשִֽׂי׃ <WH4885> of my joy

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore יִפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> shall fall בַחוּרֶ֖יהָ <WH970> Therefore her young men בִּרְחֹבֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH7339> in her streets וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֤ה <WH4421> of war יִדַּ֙מּוּ֙ <WH1826> shall be cut off בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְהִצַּ֥תִּי <WH3341> And I will kindle אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> in the wall דַּמָּ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall consume אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> the palaces בֶּן־ הֲדָֽד׃ <WH1130> of Benhadad ס

לְקֵדָ֣ר ׀ <WH6938> Concerning Kedar וּֽלְמַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> and concerning the kingdoms חָצ֗וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which הִכָּה֙ <WH5221> shall smite [נְבוּכַדְרֶאצֹּור כ] (נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5020> Nebuchadnezzar ק) מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD ק֚וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise עֲל֣וּ <WH5927> ye go up אֶל־ <WH413> to קֵדָ֔ר <WH6938> to Kedar וְשָׁדְד֖וּ <WH7703> and spoil אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the men קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of the east

אָהֳלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH168> Their tents וְצֹאנָם֙ <WH6629> and their flocks יִקָּ֔חוּ <WH3947> shall they take away יְרִיעוֹתֵיהֶ֧ם <WH3407> to themselves their curtains וְכָל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH3627> and all their vessels וּגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1581> and their camels יִשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> they shall take לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> and they וְקָרְא֧וּ <WH7121> and they shall cry עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> to מָג֖וֹר <WH4032> unto them Fear מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> [is] on every side

נֻסוּ֩ <WH5127> Flee נֻּ֨דוּ <WH5110> get מְאֹ֜ד <WH3966> you far off הֶעְמִ֧יקוּ <WH6009> deep לָשֶׁ֛בֶת <WH3427> dwell יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> O ye inhabitants חָצ֖וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָעַ֨ץ <WH3289> has formed עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5921> against נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֤ר <WH5019> for Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon עֵצָ֔ה <WH6098> A plan וְחָשַׁ֥ב <WH2803> against you and hath conceived [עֲלֵיהֶם כ] (עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against ק) מַחֲשָׁבָֽה׃ <WH4284> a purpose

ק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise עֲל֗וּ <WH5927> get you up אֶל־ <WH413> against גּ֥וֹי <WH1471> nation שְׁלֵ֛יו <WH7961> unto the wealthy יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelleth לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> without care נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> has no דְלָתַ֧יִם <WH1817> which have neither gates וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> has no בְרִ֛יחַ <WH1280> nor bars ל֖וֹ בָּדָ֥ד <WH910> alone יִשְׁכֹּֽנוּ׃ <WH7931> [which] dwell

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> will become גְמַלֵּיהֶ֜ם <WH1581> And their camels לָבַ֗ז <WH957> shall be a booty וַהֲמ֤וֹן <WH1995> and the multitude מִקְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4735> of their cattle לְשָׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> a spoil וְזֵרִתִ֥ים <WH2219> and I will scatter לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> into all winds קְצוּצֵ֣י <WH7112> them [that are] in the utmost פֵאָ֑ה <WH6285> corners וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> every עֲבָרָ֛יו <WH5676> from all sides אָבִ֥יא <WH935> and I will bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֵידָ֖ם <WH343> their calamity נְאֻם־ <WH5002> thereof saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> will become חָצ֜וֹר <WH2674> And Hazor לִמְע֥וֹן <WH4583> shall be a dwelling תַּנִּ֛ים <WH8577> for dragons שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> [and] a desolation עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> abide שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> there shall no man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָג֥וּר <WH1481> dwell בָּ֖הּ בֶּן־ <WH1121> there nor [any] son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man ס

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> concerning עֵילָ֑ם <WH5867> against Elam בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> in the beginning מַלְכ֛וּת <WH4438> of the reign צִדְקִיָּ֥ה <WH6667> of Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁבֵ֖ר <WH7665> Behold I will break אֶת־ <WH853> קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow עֵילָ֑ם <WH5867> of Elam רֵאשִׁ֖ית <WH7225> the chief גְּבוּרָתָֽם׃ <WH1369> of their might

וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <WH935> will I bring אֶל־ <WH413> upon עֵילָ֜ם <WH5867> And upon Elam אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> the four רוּח֗וֹת <WH7307> winds מֵֽאַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> from the four קְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> quarters הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְזֵ֣רִתִ֔ים <WH2219> and will scatter לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all הָרֻח֣וֹת <WH7307> them toward all those winds הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> and there shall be no nation אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> to which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יָב֥וֹא <WH935> shall not come שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there נִדְּחֵ֥י <WH5080> whither the outcasts [עֹולָם כ] (עֵילָֽם׃ <WH5867> Elam ק)

וְהַחְתַּתִּ֣י <WH2865> to be dismayed אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֠ילָם <WH5867> For I will cause Elam לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֜ם <WH341> their enemies וְלִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> and before מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <WH1245> them that seek נַפְשָׁ֗ם <WH5315> their life וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <WH935> and I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֧ם ׀ <WH5921> and רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil אֶת־ <WH853> חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> upon them [even] my fierce אַפִּ֖י <WH639> anger נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> and I will send אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> the sword עַ֥ד <WH5704> Until כַּלּוֹתִ֖י <WH3615> them till I have consumed אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> And I will set כִסְאִ֖י <WH3678> my throne בְּעֵילָ֑ם <WH5867> in Elam וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֥י <WH6> and will destroy מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> of it מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> from thence the king וְשָׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> and the princes נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> But it shall come to pass in the latter הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> days [אָשׁוּב כ] (אָשִׁ֛יב <WH7725> break ק) אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> captive ק) עֵילָ֖ם <WH5867> of Elam נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
